name: Fast Reckless Superbike Mad Wreck Thunderbird Bike Rider Game
name_original: Fast Reckless Superbike Mad Wreck Thunderbird Bike Rider Game
description:
Download and Play our new racing game Fast Reckless Super bike

Enter the world of extreme stunts. Perform dangerous stunts to Challenge your skills. Experience the real 3D bike stunts. Enjoy the amazing and thrilling bike stunts in this new adventure.

Features:
*Real 3D graphics and amazing backgrounds. *Realistic bike physics. *Unique, different and dangerous stunts in every level. *Amazing obstacles and Beautiful design tracks in each level. *Addictive game play with ultra smooth tilt controls. *It's a FREE game!

How to Play:
Tap your iPhone/iPad on right side to race / brake.
 Tap on left to control balance.
